src: “Kati tuyina emyezi enna emikulu ensekere ezi zitalina sukali naye zamulina,” nayongerezako.
mt: “We have been working on this for a long time and we are finally ready,” he said.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dr. Ehud Ur, omukugu mu madagala ku setendekero lya Dalhousie mu Halifax, Nova Scotia era sentebe w’obulwaariro n’esaza lyasayansi ery,eCanada eryasukaali lyalabudde nti okunonyereza kukyaali mu nakku zaakwo ezisooka.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a researcher at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and a member of the Canadian Institutes of Health Research, says that early detection of cancer can save lives.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Nga bakafulu abalala, takakasa oba sukaali awona, nakakasa nti ebizuulidwa bino tebirina kakwaate ku bantu abalina sukaali ow’ekika ekisooka.
mt: 1. I don't know if this is a joke or not, but I don't think this is a good idea for people who have a sweet tooth.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Ku bbalaza, Sara Danius,omuwandiisi wenkalakalira wakakiiko kabakolamu akoluzungu mu ssomero lyabu swiidi, kino kyalangilibwa mu lukale ku pulogulaamu yoluleletu lwa Sveriges mu kakiiko ka buswidi, tebasobola kutuukirira Bob Dylan buterevu ku byokuwangula ekirabo ekyamanyi mu 2016, basulawo amaanyi mu kugezako okumutuukirira.
mt: 2016 Nobel Prize winner in literature, Sara Danius, director of the Swedish Academy, announced that Bob Dylan has declined the award, citing health reasons.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius yagamba, “Akaseera kano tewali kye tukola. Nkubye essimu n’empandiika obubaka ku email eri munywanyi we era nanziramu bulungi. Mu kaseera kano, ekyo kimala.”
mt: Danius said, “This is the first time we have done this. I have sent a message and an email to the owner of the car, who is also a good friend. In this case, it is a success.”
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Gyebuvuddeko,Omukulembeze wakaweta, Jamie Siminoff, yajukira kampuni yatandika nga akade k'oluggi tekalina doboozi okuva mu dduuka lye mu garagi ye.
mt: The company's founder, Jamie Siminoff, was arrested at his home in the early hours of the morning after failing to pay a $75,000 fine.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Yazimba akade ko oluggi aka WIFI, bwe yagamba.
mt: 1. The WiFi is down, he said.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Kampuni Ya Siminoff yewana nti batunda nyo mu 2013 bwe balabikila mu pulogulamu y’e byenyanja yadde nga abakulu bali baganye okubaa ensimbi ezitandikawo biziness yabwe.
mt: 2013, Siminoff Company announced that it would be selling its entire stock of water to the public, as the company's owners were tired of the business.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Mu 2017 nga anaatera okugwako, Siminoff ya labikira ku terefayina ye byobusuubuzi ku mukutu QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff was fired from his position as CEO of QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring, yakkanya okujjawo omusango ne kampuni gyavuganya nayo eya eby’okwerinda, eya ADT.
mt: The ring, which was being worn by a woman who was suing the company for damages, was made by ADT.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Wadde nga okugezesa kw'eddagala kulabika okusobola okukendeeza ku muwendo gw'abafa Ebola, Paka kati, tewali ddagala lyakakasiddwa nti lisobola okujjanjaba obulwadde obuliwo.
mt: As the Ebola outbreak continues to spread, the disease has been identified as a potential bioterrorism agent, according to a new report.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Eddagala ZMapp lyasoka n’elilaga essuubi naye okunonyelezza okuliwo kati kulagga nti telyalina bulunginyo nga bwekyali mukusoka
mt: The ZMapp drug has been approved for emergency use, but is still in short supply and is not yet available for general use.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Mukugezesa engalo,ZMapp kyakozesebwa nga mu kukakanya, ekitegeza nti abasayansa bakikozesa nga ekyomugaso ennyo okusinzila ku bintu ebisatu ebyali bikolebwako
mt: The drug, called ZMapp, was used in a trial involving two Americans and a Spaniard, who were all infected with Ebola and had been critically ill. The drug is made from antibodies manufactured in tobacco plants.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Abakola obukodyo mu Amerika bawagidde ebbaluwa y’akakiiko ka United States Olympics era ne bakkiriza obweetaavu bw’abakola obukodyo okuwagira obutonde obubeerekamu ku lwa bannamizanyo abalala
mt: 2012 U.S. Olympic Committee officials have been meeting with the IOC to discuss the possibility of a new Olympic sport.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Tukkiriziganya n’ekiwandiiko kya USOC's ebyagalwa abazannyi n’ebibiina byaffe, n’omuzannyo gwaabwe, guyinza okusingawo nga beyongeddeyo n’enkyukakyuka eyamagezi mu kibiina, okusinga obutakkiririza ddala.
mt: We are in contact with the USOC's medical staff, and our medical staff is working with them to determine the cause of the injury and the appropriate next steps.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: Abazanyi ba gymnastics okuvva mu Amerika bawaggidde okunonyelezza okwobwesimbu okuyinza okutangazza ku ngeri abantu abayitibwa abavuumu batisibwatisibwa ng’atte bawona Larry Nassar tebamanyika okumala ebbangaddene, era n’okwetegekela enkyukakyuka.
mt: 2018 Winter Olympics gymnastics team members Aly Raisman, McKayla Maroney, Gabby Douglas, and Simone Biles have filed a lawsuit against the United States Olympic Committee and the United States Gymnastics Association, alleging that they were aware of the sexual abuse of athletes by team doctor Larry Nassar, and failed to protect them, and that they were complicit in the cover-up.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: Abebyemizanyo aba USA ne USOC balina ebigendererwa byebimu -okukola omuzanyo gw'obukolomoni, n'ebirala, nga birina obukuumi nga bw'ekisoboka eri abaddusi okugoberera ebirooto byabwe mu mbeera enungi, etalina mutawana ate nga eyambaziddwa amaanyi.
mt: The USA and USOC have been criticized - for allowing a convicted felon, and others, to be involved in the selection process, and for not doing enough to ensure that the athletes' best interests are being served, and that the athletes are not being exploited.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Mumwaka gwona ogwa 1960 Brzezinski yakolera John F. Kennedy nga omuwabuzi we oluvannyuma adiminstration ya Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: 1960 Brzezinski was a foreign policy advisor to John F. Kennedy and later a member of the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Mu biseera bya 1976 ebyoku londawo yawa carter amagezi kunkola engwira, olwamala nakola nga omuwabuzi webyokwerinda (NSA) okuva mu 1977 paka mu 1981, nga addirira Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976, Carter was briefed on the NSA's surveillance of Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Nga NSA, yayamba Carter mu kukwata ensonga zensi nobwegeendereza, nga Camp David agamba, 1978; okuzza entegeregana ya Amerika-China mu myaka gyo 1970 egyedda; olutalo lwa Iran, olwaleetera Iran okuwambibwa, nnaamagye okuyingira Afghanistan, 1979.
mt: 1978: NSA, Carter, and the Chinese, at Camp David; the U.S.-China normalization talks of the 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to Iran's isolation and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Filimu, eyalimu Ryan Gosling ne Emma Jinja, yalondebwa mukweetaba mumpaka z’obutambi obusiinze mu mitendera gyonna.
mt: 2011 film starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, was nominated for six Academy Awards.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling ne Stone baalondebwa ng'omuzannyi omusajja asinga wamu n'omukazi.
mt: Gosling and Stone were arrested for indecent exposure by a male police officer and a female police officer.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Ebyalondedwa ebirala mulimu ekifaananyi ekikyasinze, dayirekita, ebyabucinema, obwambalo, okukyuusa mu filiimu, ebyatukidwako ebyaddala, abateesiteesi, abaakoze ku maloboozi, okutabula amaloboozi n'ebizanyibwa ku lutimbe.
mt: Other items in the bill include, but are not limited to, the regulation of film, television, radio, advertising, the internet, the press, and the publication of news.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Enyimba bbiri mu sineema, okugezesebwa (abasiru ababa ne birooto) n’ebubuga bye munyenye, bafuna okusengeja kw’oyo anaba n’oluyimba olwa ddala. Lionsgate studio yafuna okusengeja 26 okusinga studio endala zonna.
mt: 2 Lionsgate films, one of which is a biopic (based on a true story) and the other a musical, have been acquired by the studio for a total of $26 million.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Ekikerezi ku ssande omukulembeze wa Amerika Donald Trump, mu sitaatimenti eyaweredwayo okuyita mumuwandiis wamawulire, yalangiridde amajje ga Amerika gatandike okuva mu Syria.
mt: In a tweet, U.S. President Donald Trump, who is under fire for his administration's response to Hurricane Maria, said the U.S. is "ready" to leave Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Okulangilira kwakoledwa nga Trump amaze okwogerela kusimu n’omukulembeze w’eTurkey Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
mt: Trump is reportedly considering a request from Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan to extradite Fethullah Gülen, a Turkish cleric living in the United States who is accused of masterminding the failed coup.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Butuluki nayo ejakutwaala obuvunanyizibwa mu kukuma abalwaanyi ba ISIS abakwatibwa, okwogera kye kwagamba, Amawanga ga Bulaya gaganye okukikola.
mt: The British government has announced that it will continue to fight ISIS.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Kino tekikakasa bukakasa nti wakiri dinosaur ezimu zalina ebyoya, endowooza eyasasanyizibwa Edda, naye nga ewa okunyonyola okugazi ku fossils okutwalira awamu tezisobola, nga langi n'enteekateka ey'emirundi esatu.
mt: This is not the first time that a dinosaur has been found in the area, but the first time that a fossil has been found in the area that is not a dinosaur, as the other fossils were found in the ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Bakakensa bagamba mbu ensolo plumage yali chestnut-omweru kunguru ne obusiwukirivu oba carotenoid-colored underside.
mt: The plumage was described as chestnut-brown with a white underside or carotenoid-colored underside.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Bafuna obuyambi mu kukola ku kutondebwawo kw'ebyooya by'ebinyonyi.
mt: 2 people were injured in the crash.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Olw’okuba nga ebyoya bya dinosaur tebirina shaft ekuze bulungi eyitibwa rachis, naye nga birina enkula endala y'ebyoya - barbs ne barbules - abanoonyereza bagamba nti rachis yali erabika okuba nga yakula mu nkyukakyuka y'ekiseera ekyaddako okusinga bino ebirala.
mt: Because dinosaurs lacked the shaft of the feather called the rachis, but had other types of feathers - barbs and barbules - researchers say the rachis was probably a later development than the others.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Enkula y’ebyooya etegeeza nti si byaakubuka naye wabula kuyamba kubbugumu n’enfanana. Abanoonyereza bateesa nti, newankubadde ekyensuti kya dainaso, sampo zilaga ekyensuti ekikulu wabula si kya kanyonyi kato
mt: The study's lead author, Dr. David Katz, said, "The idea that we can eat all we want and stay slim owes more to magic than to science. The fact is, we are biologically wired to become fatter as we age, because we are designed to survive hard times when food is scarce. And we are also wired to eat more when we're stressed."
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Abanoonyereza bateeseza nti wadde nga gunno gwemukira gwa dinosaur, ebivudemu bilaga ebyooya by’ebinyonyi ate si byabukoko wansi.
mt: Researchers say the dinosaur's feathers were likely used for display, not flight.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Bomu y’omumotoka yabwatuse kukitebe kya Police mu Gaziantep, Yurkey jjo kumakya neta abasirikale ba Police babiri nerumya abantu abalala abasoba mu makumi abbiri.
mt: 2 police officers were killed and 12 others injured in a bomb attack on a police station in Gaziantep, Turkey.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Yafisi ya gavana yalanze nti kkumi n’amwenda kw’abo abakoseddwa babade basilikale ba polisi..
mt: 10 people were killed and 30 others were injured in a stampede at a stadium in the capital of the Democratic Republic of Congo, Kinshasa, during a New Year’s Eve party, the governor of the province said.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Polisi yagamba nti bekengera Daesh gwe bayogerako (ISIL) militant y'obuvunanyizibwa Ku bulumbaganyi.
mt: Police say they have arrested an ISIL militant who was planning an attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Baasisinkanye omusana ngagukoledwako mu mitendela gyegimu nemunyenye endala: Eakyemunyenye zonna mu sisitiimu zazulidwa ngazivugibwa luminasite, okwetoolola kazoo nebirala.
mt: 2 people were killed in the crash, all 4 others on board were injured: All 4 on board were thrown from the plane, 2 of them were killed.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Okutangaala n’okwetoloola bikozesebwa okumanya omuwendo gwa Rossby ogw’emmunyeenye, ogulina akakwate ku nkukulukuta ya plasma.
mt: The Rossby waves are generated by the Coriolis effect, which causes the plasma to rotate.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Ennamba ya Rossby gyekoma okuba entono, n'emunyeenye gyekoma okukola empola ku bikwatagana ne magnetic reversals.
mt: The Rossby number is a measure of the relative strength of the Coriolis force, which is a function of the Earth's rotation, to the inertial force, which is a function of the fluid's velocity. The Coriolis force is responsible for the formation of cyclones and anticyclones, and the inertial force is responsible for the formation of eddies. The Rossby number is a measure of the relative strength of these two forces, and is used to determine the stability of a fluid flow. The Rossby number is also used to determine the stability of a fluid flow in the presence of a magnetic field.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Mulugendo lwe, Iwasaki yagwa mubuzibu emirundi Minji.
mt: 1. Iwasaki died in a car accident.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Yabibwa abalunyanja, yalumbibwa mu Tibet ne mbwa, n’adduka mu bufumbo mu Nepal era n’akwatibwa mu India.
mt: 1. It was shot by hunters in Tibet, 2. It was found in Nepal, 3. It was captured in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: E 802.11n ey’omulembe ekozesebwa ku 2.4Ghz ne 5.0Ghz mu mayengo.
mt: 802.11n devices operating on 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz bands in the same area.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Kino kijjya kukiliza okukwatagana ne 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g kasita okuduuduma kubeera nga kuliko ladiyo bbiri.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g are all supported, but only one radio can be active at a time.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Sipiidi za 802.11n bulijjo zanguwa okusinga kkwezo ezasookawo ngazirina obugumu bwa 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n devices are now available with speeds up to 600Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, ngono mufumbo alina abaana abakulu babiri, teyalese kwesima kwamaanyi eri Miller, ngono olugero gwelwabadde lukwatako.
mt: Duvall, who has two adult children, is survived by his wife, Miller, who was not injured in the crash.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: “Tujja kugezaako nyo okusala ensamulo za karboni dioxide ku buli muwendo gwa GDP ku musale ogulabikako ogwa 2020 okuva 2005,” Hu bweyagamba.
mt: “We need to reduce carbon dioxide emissions by 20 percent from 2005 levels by 2020,” Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Teyataddewo muwendo gw’ebintu, ng’agamba nti kijja kukolebwa okusinziira ku nfulumya y’ensimbi za China.
mt: 1,000 tons of goods, according to reports, will be shipped to China for repair.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu yakubirizza ensi ezikyaakulakulana “Okwewala engeri enkadde ez’okwoonoona n’olongosa oluvanyuma.”
mt: The incident has sparked a debate on how to prevent such accidents in the future.
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Yayongedeko nti tebalina kuwebwa milimu egisuka mu ndowoza yabwe n’entegela gyebatuseko,n’ebyebasobola okwekolera.
mt: They say they don't have the resources to provide the books and equipment needed to teach the students.
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Ekibiina kyabayivu ekya Iraq kyalaze alipoota ku saawa 12.00 GMT leero.
mt: 12.00 GMT today, Iraq's main political blocs will meet to discuss the formation of a new government.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Okulabulwa nti tewali kukakasa nti ekikolebwa kyona e Iraq kunamalawo olutalo lweddini, okulwanagana oba okudda mu butabanguko
mt: It was reported that the attack was not related to the ongoing war in Iraq, but rather a protest or demonstration.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Liipoota etandiika nakwegayirira bakole olutuula olwabuli omu era wabeewo entegeraagana mu mawanga amagate kubikwatagana nne middle East.
mt: The report also said the plane was carrying a large amount of cash and gold, and was en route to the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Alipoota evumirira nnyo kumpi buli kantu akasalibwawo abakungu eri Iraq era ewabula nti enkyusakyusa yetaagisa.
mt: 1,000s of protesters have been killed by the Iraqi government, and the U.S. has been silent.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Ekisooka mu biragiro 78 kiri nti eteeka epya lirina okuba nga liteekebwa mu nkola nga omwaka tegunagwako okusobola okukuuma ensalosalo za Iraq okuva eri obulumbaganyi n’okuteekawo ebyenkolagana ne bamulirwana baayo.
mt: 78 people were killed in a new wave of violence that has been blamed on the rise of ISIS and the collapse of the Iraqi government.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Omukulebeze era omukyala asooka mu Argentine Lady Christina Fernandez de Kirchner yalangirira nga bwagenda okwesimbawo ku bwa puleidenti jjo akawungezi mu La Plate, ekibuga ekiri kilomita attaano mailo asatu okuv amu Buenos Aires
mt: Argentine President Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner was rushed to a hospital after suffering a head injury in a car accident in La Plate, a city 20 miles south of Buenos Aires
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Mukyala wa Kirchner yalangilira ebigendelerwa bye eby'okwesimbawo Ku bwa pulezidenti Ku swiyeeta ya Argentine, ekifo kyekimu kyeyakozesa okutandika kampeyini ze eza seneti nga memba w'abakungu b'esazza lya Buenos Aires.
mt: The daughter of former Argentine President Cristina Kirchner has been arrested on charges of money laundering. The charges stem from her role as a senator and member of the Buenos Aires provincial legislature.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Okukubaganya ebirowoozo kwatandikira ku butabanguko okwanguyiriza mu buyambi n’okuddamu okuzimba olwa okubaawo kwa Hurricane Katrina; abamu kuba konsavative kyebayise “ddiru ya Bush empya eya Orleans. ”
mt: 2005 Hurricane Katrina relief efforts are criticized for being too slow and too conservative by some, who call it “Bush’s new Orleans disaster.”
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Abakiririza mu nkyuukakyuuka y’okudamu okuzimba batunuulidennyo okudamu okugaba konturakita eri abateberezebwa okubeera mu Washington munda.
mt: The U.S. government has been criticized for its failure to act on the warnings of a potential terrorist attack.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Abantu abasukka mu bukadde obuna baagenda e Rooma okwetaba ku maziika.
mt: 100 people from the same village in the Philippines are in Rome to protest the government's plan to build a dam in their village.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Ennamba y’abantu abaabaddewo yabadde nnenne nyo nti tekyaasobose buli muntu okutuuka ku kuziika mu St. Peter's Square.
mt: 9 people have been killed in the attack, with no one being able to enter St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Amatiivi amanene gateekebwa mu bifo ebisinga mu Roma okusobozesa abantu okulaba ebijaguzo.
mt: 2,000 volunteers were deployed in Rome to help people find their way.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Mu bibuga bingi ebya Yitale ne ensi yonna, okusingira ddala mu Poland, ebintu ebyefaananyiribya binnabyo byakolebwa ate byalabibwa nnamungi w’abantu bangi.
mt: In many countries, including Poland, the most common cause of death is heart disease.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Abebyafayo banenyezamu enkola y’abambega ba FBI mu ngeri gyebafyo enyo ku misango emitono nga obubbi bwe motoka ng’engeri y’okulagamu nti bakola nyo nobuwanguzi bwebasobodde okutuukako.
mt: FBI agents were involved in a car chase that ended in a crash after the driver refused to stop and then fled on foot.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Abekibiina ekifuzi batandika okussa ensimbi mubyobuseeu mu 2005 era nebategeeza nti FBI etekedwa okussa abakozi bayo 10 mu byobukaba ebyabakulu.
mt: 2005, the FBI was accused of spying on 10 of its top officials.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa ya kola ebyomundda ne obubonero obw’wagulu , emisinde 70 runs ne mipiira 41 okukona nya’s 11 n mikaga 2.
mt: 70 runs and 41 balls, Robin Uthappa scored 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Abazanyi baawakati, Sachin, Tendulkar ne Rahul Dravid, bazanye bulungi ne bakalo ekimu kya omukwano.
mt: 3 of the 4 members of the Indian cricket team, Sachin Tendulkar, Rahul Dravid and VVS Laxman, were injured in the crash.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Nga bamaze okufiirwa wiketi ya kaputeni, India yadduse emirundi asatu mu mukaaga ne basulua wiketi musanvu nga tebannamaliriza.
mt: 3 days after the captain's flight log was confiscated, India has seized the co-pilot's logbook and refused to release it.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Pulezidenti George .W. Bush owa U.S. Yatuuka mu singapore mu makya agomwezi gwe kumi nogumu nga 16, okutandiika okulambula kwa wiiki okuwanvu okwa Asia.
mt: 16 days ago, President George W. Bush of the United States arrived in Singapore for a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Yalamusidwa amyuuka Katikiro wa Singapore Wong Kan nebakubaganya ebirowoozo kunsonga z’ebyobusuubuzi n’obutujju ne Katikiro wa Singapore Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and his Singaporean counterpart Lee Hsien Loong discussed bilateral cooperation in the fields of trade and investment.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Oluvanyuma lwa sabiiti emu eyokufiirwa mu kulonda mumakati gekisanja, Bush yuagamba abantu ku kugaziya ebyobusuubuzi mu Asia.
mt: 11 days after his inauguration, Bush told Asian leaders to open up their markets.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Katikiro Stephen Harper akkiriza okuwereza ‘ebbago ly’empewo enyonjo’ erya gavumenti eri ebibiina byonna okuliyitamu, nga terinaddamu kusomwa, oluvanyuma lw’akakiiko akamaze eddakiika 25 n’omukulembeze wa NDP Jack Layton ku PMO.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has been criticized for his government’s “secretive” approach to the F-35 fighter jet, which has been the subject of a parliamentary committee report and a public spat between the prime minister’s office and NDP Leader Jack Layton.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton yali yasaba wabelewo enkyukakyuka mu tekka ly’obutondde mu lukuungana ne sabaminisita ng’asaba baddemu okulyekenenya
mt: Layton was asked about the controversy surrounding the meeting with the minister and said he was not aware of the issue.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Okuva Gavumenti ya federo lweyayimirira mukugaba obuyambi mu dwaliro lya Mersey mu Devonport, Tasmania ne gavumenti ya state n’ababaka abamu aba Federo bavumiride ekikolwa kino nga akakodyo mu prelude eri okulonda kwa federo okunayitibwa mu mwezi gw’ekuminogumu.
mt: The federal government has announced it will close the Mersey Marine Base in Devonport, Tasmania, and the state government and federal opposition have both criticised the decision, which is expected to be announced in May.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Naye Sabaminista John Howard yagambye nti kino bakikoze okukuma ebintu by’eddwaliro obutayinonebwa gavumenti ya Tasmania nga babawa Dolla ya Australia obukadde ana mu butano AUD$45.
mt: Meanwhile, former Prime Minister John Howard said the government's decision to close the facility was "a mistake" and that the Tasmanian government should have been given $45 million to keep it open.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Okusinzila ku mawulire agaliwo, waliwo omuyaga n’empewo ebyamanyi. Waliwo enkuba eyamanyi eyatonye okumpi ne Pago pago ne Niue
mt: 2 people were killed, 1 was missing. 1 person was killed in Pago Pago and 1 in Niue
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Tewali byamaanyi byononese wadde obuvune bulabidwaako mu Tonga, naye manyi gabagwaako okumala akaseera, ekyagambibwa nti abakulembeze be Tonga okuva lwebafuna okulabulwa ku Tsunami okuva eri PTWC.
mt: The tsunami warning was issued by the Tonga National Emergency Management Office, but was later cancelled, according to PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Amasomero agawerera ddala kkumina’ana mu Hawaii agali ku oba kumpi ne layini z'okumbalama gonna gagaddwa ku lwokusatu newankubadde okulabula kwajiddwawo.
mt: 12 people were injured in Hawaii when a school bus collided with a dump truck on a highway.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Omukulembeze (Pulezidenti) wa Amerika George W Bush yayanirizza ekirango.
mt: 43rd President of the United States George W Bush has died.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Omwogezi wa Bush Gordon Johndroe yayaniliza obweyamo bwa North Korea. Kino kilabikilwa ng’engeri y’okulaba nga bamalawo enkozesa y’amanyi ga nukiliya mu bitundu bya korea
mt: White House spokesman Bush Gordon Johndroe said North Korea's nuclear test was a "provocative act" that would only further isolate the country. The test was conducted in the northeastern region of North Korea, where the country has been developing nuclear weapons.
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Omuyaga ogwekkumi ku sizoni ye miyaga ja atalanta, omuyaga jerry, ejikolebwa mu semayanja olwaaleero.
mt: 10th day of the 2012-2013 season, Jerry, a rookie.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Ab’ekitongole kyomuyaga ekya (NHC) bagamba nti omuzila Jerry tegulina bulabe wano ku taka
mt: The National Hurricane Center says Jerry is expected to strengthen over the next few days.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Abasirikale ba America bayinginiya batebereza yinki 6 ezenkuba zisobola okukosa levees ezayita.
mt: 6 American officials have been recalled from the embassy in protest.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Akasenge akomwenda, eyalaba amataba nga gali wa ggulu ebigere nga 20 mu biseera byomuyaga Katrina, eri kati mu mazzi agatuukira ddala mu kiwato nga levee eri okumpi yabooga.
mt: 20 people are missing after the levee broke, which was built to withstand the effects of Hurricane Katrina, and is now being overtopped by the rising water.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Amazzi gayiika Ku levee mu kitundu fuuti 100 mubugazi.
mt: 100 meters of water flooded the area.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Senkulu Adam Cuerden yalaze okunyolwa ku byasazidwaamu bweyayogedde eri Wikinews omwezi oguwedde.
mt: Adam Cuerden was credited for creating the article on Wikinews last week.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: “He [wales] ddala yatulimba okuva muntanddikwa. ekisooka, okweyisa nga owensonga za mateeka. Eky’okubbiri, okwefula nga atuwuliriza ki ffe, okuvira ddala wagulu mu bifananyi bye.”
mt: “He [wales] ddala yatulimba okuva muntanddikwa. ekisooka, okweyisa nga owensonga za mateeka. Eky’okubbiri, okwefula nga atuwuliriza ki ffe, okuvira ddala wagulu mu bifananyi bye.”
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Okwenyiwa kw'abantu kwaletera okufuba okuliwo okwokutekawo enkola ekwata kubintu byokwegatta ku lw'omutimbagano ogwaniriza obukadde bwa midia ataliiko mateeka.
mt: The public outcry has led to the postponement of the bill that would allow the media to be censored.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Omulimo ogwakoleddwa okusinga gwabadde mu buwandiike, naye pulogulaamu yabadde mpadiike okuyitimula ebyazuuliddwa okuva mu Sagittarius galaxy.
mt: The project was originally scheduled to begin in 2014, but was delayed due to budget cuts, and is now expected to begin in 2017, with the first results expected in 2019.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Ekintu abakugu kye babadde banoonya kyabadde kiretebwa obuddugavu wakati wa mata w’emunyenye za galaxy ne mata enzirugavu eza Milky Way.
mt: The object that astronomers have been tracking for the past few days has been identified as a comet from the Oort cloud and the Milky Way galaxy.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Nga omwezi bwe gusika ensi, nereeterawo emiyaga, ne Milky way bweeteeka amaanyi ku Sagittatius galaxy.
mt: 2012 is the year of the dragon, the milky way is visible in the southern hemisphere, and the Sagittatius galaxy is visible in the northern hemisphere.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Ba nasayansi basobola okuwunzika nti ensonga ekutte ekizikiza ekosa ensonga endala ey'ekizikiza mungeri y'emu ensonga eyabulijjo ky'ekola.
mt: Scientists say that the new method could be used to detect other diseases as well.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Kino kigamba nti ensonga ezisinga ezenzikiza okwetoolola ensi zisangibwa ku galaxe eringa “owaye” era ngekolebwa obutundutundu obutonotpono bungi.
mt: This suggests that the problem of overpopulation is not a problem of too many people, but of too little resources.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Amawulire ga telefayina galaga omukka omweeru nga guva mu kolero.
mt: 2 people were injured in a car accident.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Abakulembeze abye byalo balabula abatuze mu kifo ewali ebimera basigale mu nju zabwe munda, okujjako byonna ebyuma ebileta ebugumu awamu n’empewo ‘obutanywa mazzi ga tapu
mt: 2 crew members were killed on the spot, the rest were injured and taken to hospital, with burns and smoke inhalation.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Okusinzira Ku kitongole kya nukiliya ekya Japan, radioactive caesium ne iodine kizuliddwa Ku kolero.
mt: According to the Japan Nuclear Regulatory Authority, radioactive caesium and iodine were detected in the water.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Ab'obuyinza bateebereza nti konteyina ezirimu amafuta ga uranium ku sayiti ziyinza okuba nga zayabise era nga zitonya.
mt: The company that operates the site said the contamination was contained and did not pose a threat.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dr. Tony Moll yazuula eddagala erivvumula akafuba (XDR-TB) mu maserengeta ga Afrika kwa Zulu-Natal.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll said the XDR-TB outbreak in the KwaZulu-Natal province of South Africa was a "wake-up call" for the world.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Mu kubuuzibwa (yintavyu), yagambye nti enkyuukakyuuka empya zaabadde “Zitabula nnyo era nga zeeralikiriza kulwemiwendo kwebuzaalira jeri waggulu.”
mt: In a statement, the company said the new planes were “very quiet” and “will help reduce noise pollution in the area.”
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Abalwadde abamu balabika bafunye ekiwuka mu ddwaliro, omusawo Moll bwalowooza, ate nga ekitono babiri baali bakola mu ddwaliro.
mt: 2 people were killed, one of them was a nurse, Moll said, and the other was a patient at the hospital.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
